CustomField.formula: IF( ( CHANNEL_ORDERS__Renewal_Date__c - TODAY() ) <= 45 && ( ( CHANNEL_ORDERS__Renewal_Date__c - TODAY() ) > 0 ), IMAGE("/resource/CHANNEL_ORDERS__uilib/images/warning_60_yellow.png", "warning", 16, 16) & ' Ends in ' & TEXT( CHANNEL_ORDERS__Renewal_Date__c - TODAY()) & ' Days', null)
CustomField.label: Status
